TopicTitle: Do someone know why this happens

Articles.Content: I'm playing ksp in RO RSS anyway when I launch rocket sometimes this bug occurs. I've never seen this before. The first stages are empty when I press "Space" button nothing happens till 3 stage. Then there's an explosion.

Seems your Vesselfile is broken/inconsistent.

Did you try to completely rebuild that rocket?

I have these kind of issue while playing with RSS/RO mods.

The spacecraft is separated by two parts, and I can fly each of them by pressing '[' and ']', but they are not two parts physically, which seems to be strange.

On 3/20/2016 at 7:44 AM, virtualizerocket said:

I have these kind of issue while playing with RSS/RO mods.

The spacecraft is separated by two parts, and I can fly each of them by pressing '[' and ']', but they are not two parts physically, which seems to be strange.

If that's the case, maybe it's caused by the weight of the rocket breaking the joints connecting the parts. KJR and struct should help.

On 2016年4月7日 at 10:17 PM, Jas0n said:

If that's the case, maybe it's caused by the weight of the rocket breaking the joints connecting the parts. KJR and struct should help.

But that didn't work, indeed.

This happens rear, and I am using KJR. The parts are still combined together, and I can launch the rocket, but controlling is a real hard job.  Nothing broke.
Sorry I forgot to answer. This thing happened because the rocket had insufficient avionics. If you have enough than it works perfectly
